data.name: HomeTitle
data.value: Home

data.name: WelcomeHeading
data.value: {0} to FarewellMyBeloved Memorial Pages

data.name: IntroLead
data.value: A digital space to honor and remember our beloved ones who have passed away. Create and share farewell messages, memories, and tributes to celebrate their lives and keep their spirits alive in our hearts.

data.name: IntroP2
data.value: Each person has their own dedicated page where friends and family can share their thoughts, memories, and farewells. It's a beautiful way to create a lasting legacy for those we've lost.

data.name: FindFarewellPage
data.value: Find Memorial Page

data.name: SearchOrCreate
data.value: Search for someone's memorial page or create a new one

data.name: SearchPlaceholder
data.value: Enter name to search...

data.name: Search
data.value: Search

data.name: NotFinding
data.value: Not finding the memorial page you need?

data.name: CantFindCreate
data.value: If you cannot locate an existing memorial page, create a new space to honor your loved one and collect shared memories instantly.

data.name: CreateNewFarewellPage
data.value: Create New Memorial Page

data.name: HomeMetaTitle
data.value: FarewellMyBeloved | Create Memorial Pages & Share Farewell Memories

data.name: HomeMetaDescription
data.value: Create a memorial page to honor loved ones, share farewell memories, and invite family to contribute heartfelt tributes on FarewellMyBeloved.

data.name: HomeMetaKeywords
data.value: create memorial page, share farewell memories, honor loved ones

data.value: Create and Share Memorial Pages

data.name: HomeStepsIntro
data.value: Follow each step to build a memorial page, invite tributes, and keep farewell memories alive.

data.value: Create a memorial page

data.name: HomeStepsCreateCopy
data.value: Start a dedicated memorial page with stories, photos, and farewell messages to honor your loved one.

data.value: Create your memorial page

data.value: Share memories together

data.value: Honor every remembrance
